name: Accounting Brains
quote: It's not about having lots of money. It's knowing how to manage it.
description: Accounting Brains simplifies accounting, compliance, and financial operations for US businesses and non-profit organizations through end-to-end bookkeeping and accounting, delivered via our Global Delivery Center with strong processes, multi-level independent quality controls, predictable outcomes, and continuous process improvement.
author: Accounting Brains Team

businesses: Budgeting, forecasting, and cash flow analysis

managed.name: Managed Accounting Services (GDC-Managed)
managed.description: We fully manage your bookkeeping and accounting function end-to-end.
features: Multi-level reviews and independent quality oversight
Regular client check-ins and live reviews

dedicated.name: Dedicated Accountant / Dedicated Team Model
dedicated.description: For organizations that prefer deeper control, resources work exclusively for your organization.
features: Resources work exclusively for your organization
Team members operate as an extension of your internal team
Resources remain on Accounting Brains' payroll
We manage hiring, onboarding, training, HR, infrastructure, and quality controls

whatYouGet: Live review sessions with finance experts
Strong data security and access controls
differentiators: Dedicated accountants with independent quality oversight
Clear reporting, live reviews, and KPI-driven insights
Typically 40-60% cost efficiency vs in-house or US-based models
